suggestions.name: Sales Volume by Region
suggestions.description: Visualize total sales volume across different geographic regions to identify high-performing markets.
suggestions.code_template:
df.groupby('Region')['Sales_Volume'].sum().plot(kind='bar', title='Total Sales Volume by Region')
plt.ylabel('Units Sold')
plt.show()

suggestions.name: Price vs Engine Size Correlation
suggestions.description: Analyze the relationship between engine size and vehicle price using regression to detect pricing trends.
suggestions.code_template:
sns.regplot(x='Engine_Size_L', y='Price_USD', data=df)
plt.title('Price vs Engine Size with Regression Line')
plt.xlabel('Engine Size (L)')
plt.show()

suggestions.name: Fuel Type Distribution
suggestions.description: Show the proportion of vehicles by fuel type to understand market adoption of different fuel technologies.
suggestions.code_template:
df['Fuel_Type'].value_counts().plot(kind='pie', autopct='%1.1f%%', title='Fuel Type Distribution')
plt.ylabel('')
plt.show()

suggestions.name: Average Mileage by Manufacturing Year
suggestions.description: Examine how mileage varies with vehicle age to assess usage patterns across model years.
suggestions.code_template:
df.groupby('Year')['Mileage_KM'].mean().plot(kind='line', marker='o', title='Average Mileage by Manufacturing Year')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Average Mileage (KM)')
plt.show()

suggestions.name: Price Distribution by Sales Classification
suggestions.description: Compare price ranges between high and low sales performance categories to identify pricing strategies.
suggestions.code_template:
sns.boxplot(x='Sales_Classification', y='Price_USD', data=df)
plt.title('Price Distribution by Sales Classification')
plt.show()
